attributes.action: Create new traffic laws to enable public service buses to operate effectively
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The only way to enable bus services to perform to time and quality is to ensure that they can make progress on their routes.

For example ...
1.  No overtaking of any stationery bus so that they can pull out and make progress.
2.  At junctions and roundabouts instant priority for buses, all other vehicles must let them out.
3.  Red route markings on all bus routes so no stopping or parking at any time, especially outside schools.
4.  CCTV on all buses admissable as evidence in court, offenders against the above will have their licence to drive withheld for 1 week (1st offence), 1 month (2nd offence) and 6 months (further offences).
